extendedInfo.description: CAUTION: THERE IS A RATING SPAM ATTACK. SOMEONE IS GIVING THIS APP NUMEROUS 1 STARS WITH RUBBISH COMMENTS. PLEASE DISREGARD. THE APP IS COMPLETELY SAFE TO USE. I HAVE CONTACTED GOOGLE TO GET THIS ISSUE RESOLVED. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT - MICKY MULTANICodeJuice is an engineering App for calculating common variables related to pressure vessel, piping and tank design and inspection in accordance with the latest ASME and API codes.################################################################################################The PRO Version has ASME Section II Part D Stress Tables  for 1-click look-up of Allowable Stress values for your Pressure Vessel Materials. No More Sorting through codes to find the correct Allowable Stress values for your design conditions!################################################################################################It uses smooth coding and smart logic programming of the industry codes to give you accurate:1. Minimum thickness required for internal pressure design for new pressure vessels (per ASME Section VIII Div 1 - 2012). This includes shell thickness and all different pressure vessel head configurations.2. Minimum thickness required for new process pipipng for internal pressure(per ASME B31.3 - 2012) 3. API 570, API 510 and API 653 Inspection calcs for MAWP of corroded pipe, pressure vessels and tanks + calculation of corrosion rates and remaining life.Download the FREE version to see the functionality of CodeJuice for quick code checks required in your job.The PRO version features the ASME Section II Part D Material Allowable Stress Values, the FREE version requires you to input the Allowable Stress values manually.Recommended for Maintenance Engineers, Pressure Vessel and Piping Engineers, Process Engineers, Plant Inspection and Mechanical Integrity Professionals.For questions, concerns or feedback please email our support team here:codejuicepro@gmail.comYour support is much appreciated.Thank You!

reviews.title: Please Stop the Rating Spam!
reviews.comment: To whoever it concerns:  Please stop the rating spam.(In regards to the 31 1-star ratings today!) Your ratings mean nothing to people who have downloaded the app and are happily using it. It is a genuine tool created by an engineer for other engineers/inspectors and plant professionals. I do not know what your objective is, but it is a sincere request to stop the spam.  To all prospective users: Please download and use the app without any concerns. Please also help by rating the app (only if you find it use
reviews.author: Micky Multani

reviews.title: Very Useful!
reviews.comment: CodeJuice gives you instant answers for all your pipe layout and design problems, including complex rolling offsets, flow rates, pressures, areas,piping and tank design and inspection and more. You\'ll spend less time calculating and looking at charts..Worked great for me and highly recommended!
reviews.author: ROYAL ENTERPRISES

reviews.title: Perfectly designed for engineers!
reviews.comment: Great App! Makes my life easier knowing that I can size pipes in seconds without having to reference annoying nomographs! Nice Work!!!
reviews.author: Hasan Kagalwala

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Its a really nice app  for engineering students like me who r specializing in fluid mechanics and pipe designs..It also helps me during my projects..Thanks and credit to developers!
reviews.author: TM K

reviews.title: Practical usage
reviews.comment: I am a process engineer and love it!
reviews.author: Allan Wiehle

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Weld quality factors lookup. Simplifies the process. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Kum Noll

reviews.title: Specialty app
reviews.comment: No reason to rare badly. Good app with lots of functionality designed for engineers. Can\'t live without it.
reviews.author: Johnathan Heidth
